Data Access Layer

In devon4j, we propose to use Spring Data JPA to build the data access layer using repositories and Querydsl to build dynamic queries. We will also use this approach for Quarkus applications, but we need to change the implementation because the devon4j modules are based on reflection, which is not suitable for Quarkus.
In Quarkus we will use Querydsl using code generation. So for this layer, more changes are required and we canâ€™t just take the existing code.
